meanings.definition: The quality or state of being dark or dusky in complexion.
meanings.sent1: Her swarthiness made her stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The actor's swarthiness added depth to his character portrayal.
meanings.sent3: Despite her swarthiness, she always wore bright, colorful clothes.
meanings.sent4: The swarthiness of the forest at night was both eerie and enchanting.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the swarthiness of the storm clouds in his painting.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a dark or tanned skin tone.
meanings.sent1: His swarthiness was a result of spending hours under the sun.
meanings.sent2: The model's swarthiness was admired by many in the fashion industry.
meanings.sent3: The swarthiness of the beachgoers made them look like bronzed statues.
meanings.sent4: The swarthiness of the old leather jacket gave it a rugged charm.
meanings.sent5: The swarthiness of the coffee beans indicated their rich flavor.
